name: Luxury Cruise Voyage Escape
description: Luxury Cruise Voyage Escape is a point and click type game developed by BestEscapeGames. Aashi got selected for a modeling contest, so she needs to go to London. Once she reached there she is shocked to see many people got selected for this contest. Even though she is very confident in winning. After two weeks her ranking in the contest is top five. All are talking about aashi performance and saying that she is going to win. One of the competitor got upset and thought to kidnap her. Aashi is there under her custody, in the cruise. Now, all you need to do is to find out the objects and solve the puzzles to Escape her from the Luxury Cruise Voyage. Keep playing and have fun. Good Luck.
